survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Digital Detox Programs Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate employee satisfaction and effectiveness of digital detox programs implemented to reduce screen time and improve mental well-being.

questions.question_text: How often do you participate in the company's digital detox programs?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection. Ensure options cover all possible frequencies.

script.question_text: How often do you participate in the company's digital detox programs?

questions.question_text: What activities do you engage in during digital detox sessions? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Shown if Q1 answer is not 'Never'
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-choice selection. Include an 'Other' option if needed.

script.question_text: What activities do you engage in during digital detox sessions? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Shown if Q1 answer is not 'Never'

questions.question_text: How has participating in digital detox programs impacted your productivity?
questions.routing_logic: Shown if Q1 answer is not 'Never'
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for single-choice selection. Ensure neutral option is included.

script.question_text: How has participating in digital detox programs impacted your productivity?
script.routing_logic: Shown if Q1 answer is not 'Never'

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the digital detox programs?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-text field to gather qualitative feedback. Limit to 500 characters.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the digital detox programs?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend the digital detox programs to your colleagues?
questions.routing_logic: Shown if Q1 answer is not 'Never'
